intro: Micrargeria sopubioides, commonly known as the Mexican fireweed, is a flowering plant native to Mexico. It belongs to the family Asteraceae, which includes daisies and sunflowers, and is characterized by its composite flower heads. Micrargeria sopubioides is also known for its medicinal properties and has been used traditionally in herbal remedies.
